content: so relaxing to make you re sure to find calm with this crochet tote bag project stitched using only 1 ball of red heart all in one granny square create perfect squares without changing colors simply stitch up your motifs then join them together practice granny squares flat slip_stitch s measurement approx 17 43 cm square excluding straps approx 17 square for the perfect grab n go bag materials red heart® granny square all in one™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m white-citrus twist 2002 1 ball or 12 granny squares
